name: Allen Hsu
body:
### Welcome to Allen Hsu's home page!
This website contains personal information about Allen Hsu, and other information.

### Introduction
I am a Canadian student who immigrated from Taiwan, a small island beside China. The main reason we moved to Canada was the education, it was way too much for a middle school student to take. You have to get up at 6:00am everyday to catch to bus that comes at 6:30am. And the school ends at 9:30pm everyday.
